definition: Not qualified or diminished in any way
The quality or state of being ridiculous or wildly unreasonable.
The bad quality of being abusive towards someone or something.
The action of consenting to receive or undertake something offered.
A successful result gained through effort.
The quality of being able to adjust to new conditions.
The act of making something suitable for a new use or purpose.
The state of being sufficient for the purpose concerned.
A condition or circumstance that puts one in a favorable or superior position.
